name: PhillyLiveRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: philly live radio
des: Philly Live Radio is located in the city of brotherly love Philadelphia PA.. From R&B to Funk, Jazz, Dance and Fusion, PLR is home to a number of great musicians and entertainers. The station was established by Gilbert F. Lomax Jr and Doris Hall-James. PLR offers independent artists a platform for their music/artistry to be heard while affording them an opportunity to grow their fan base, gain experience and exposure. Philly Live Radio is positioning itself to be a key outlet for artists and entrepreneurs for many years to come. Make sure you become part of this movement.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
